messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Live and Learn 2004 Conference

messages.messageBody:

<< I was talking to Paul and he said to take what we'll need out of our tax
return to set aside so that Sarah and I can attend and stay at the hotel and
everything, and he'll plan on taking leave if he has to so that he can be home
those days!!! >>

Cool!!

If he went too, he would meet dads, and see older kids...

Maybe 2005 <g>.

Sandra

messages.subject: Live and Learn 2004 Conference
messages.msgSnippet: YAY!!! I was talking to Paul and he said to take what we ll need out of our tax return to set aside so that Sarah and I can attend and stay at the hotel and
messages.messageBody:
YAY!!!

I was talking to Paul and he said to take what we'll need out of our tax return to set aside so that Sarah and I can attend and stay at the hotel and everything, and he'll plan on taking leave if he has to so that he can be home those days!!!

I told him that not only would it be beneficial to our educational lives, but to Sarah and I personally to have a serious "Mommy-Daughter" experience!

He's ALL for it! YAY!!! Oh I am SOOOO excited!!

Elizabeth


Everything I need to know, I learned on my own!
